message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $100. I'm confident you'll find it valuable, but if you're unsure, I can offer you a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're still hesitant, I can provide you with a testimonial from a previous customer who purchased this product and was extremely satisfied.
Thanks for the offer and the guarantee. I'm happy to buy it.

I'm glad you were satisfied with the previous purchase! This product is also a high-quality one, and I think you'll find it's even more valuable than the first one. I've received excellent feedback from multiple customers who've purchased this specific product, and I'm confident you'll be impressed. Would you like to make it yours for $100?
Based on your previous recommendations and the positive feedback you mentioned, I'm confident this will be a good purchase as well. I'll take it!

I want to be transparent with you, Bob. This product is not one of our top-of-the-line models. While it still has some useful features, it may not meet your expectations in terms of performance. However, I can offer you a unique opportunity to try it out for a lower price - I'll give you a 10% discount, making it $90. This way, you can still experience the benefits of our brand without breaking the bank.
I appreciate the transparency, but given the potential performance limitations, I think I'll pass on this one. Thanks for the offer though.

No worries at all, Bob! I completely understand your concerns about the previous product. This one is a different story, though - it's one of our top-selling high-quality products, and I'm confident you'll be extremely satisfied. In fact, I've got a special promotion going on right now - if you buy this product, I'll throw in a complementary accessory that's a $20 value. That brings the price down to $80, which is a great deal considering the value you'll get. Would you like to take advantage of this offer?
That sounds like a great deal! I'm interested in the complementary accessory and the discounted price.  I'll take it!

I'm glad you liked the previous offer! This product is another high-quality one, and I think you'll find it's a great addition to your collection. However, I want to make it even more appealing to you. Since you've been a loyal customer so far, I'm willing to give you an exclusive deal - I'll give you an additional 5% off the already low price of $100, making it $95. Plus, I'll include a personalized thank-you note from our team, which is a $10 value. What do you think?
I'm always happy to receive a personalized thank-you note. I'll take advantage of this exclusive deal and buy this product!

I'm glad you appreciated the personalized touch! This high-quality product is a game-changer in its category, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny. As a valued customer, I want to make sure you have the best possible experience. I'm offering you a special 'buy now and get a free upgrade' deal - if you purchase this product, I'll upgrade you to our premium support package, which includes priority access to our team and exclusive software updates. That's a $50 value, absolutely free. The price remains at $100, but I think you'll find it's a steal.
